actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act and the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide that compliance orders shall include cost-benefit analyses.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act and the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require that compliance orders issued under applicable air and water pollution control standards include cost-benefit analyses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act and the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide that compliance orders shall include cost-benefit analyses.
